equipment.name: Red Dot
spcRules: +1 to targeting rolls in the first RI

equipment.name: Laser Sight
spcRules: +1 targeting roll in the first RI, first 2 RI at night w/ NVG

equipment.name: Scope
spcRules: +1 targeting rolls in all but the 1st RI, if model did not move

equipment.name: Suppressor
spcRules: not heard more than one RI away

equipment.name: Flashlight/Torch
spcRules: Double detection zone at night
+2 for targeting against this model

equipment.name: AP Ammo
spcRules: +1 penetration to base weapon

equipment.name: Subsonic Ammo
spcRules: models are only alerted with in half 2 RI
Cannot be fired past 3 RI
-2 penetration

equipment.name: Body Armour
spcRules: -1 on lethality roll

equipment.name: Heavy Body Armour
spcRules: -1 on lethality roll
successful lethality rolls must be re-rolled
-1 to Agility

equipment.name: Ghillie Suit
spcRules: +1 to defence while in cover
-1 to enemy detection rolls
Subject to hidden and detection rules

equipment.name: Night Vision Optics
spcRules: Equiped Model follows daytime rules at night
Smoke still obscures as normal

equipment.name: Smart Goggles
spcRules: Equiped Model follows daytime rules at night
Ignores the effects of smoke
+1 to detection roll

equipment.name: Thermal Sight
spcRules: roll to detect: +1 to results
+2 at night; scan command: +1 to roll; can see through smoke
+1 to targeting roll in all but 1st RI if not moved

equipment.name: Radio Comms
spcRules: Can communicate with any squand member with a radio, allowing them to use the squad leader's CD, even if not cohesive
Can communicate with any friendly model on the board, see Alert rules

equipment.name: Battlefield Trauma Kit
spcRules: Allows model to make the MEDIC! tactical action

equipment.name: Long Range Comms
spcRules: Can communcate with forces off the board
Required for certain Off Table Assests

equipment.name: Binos
spcRules: Receives a +1 modifier to Scan Command Action
When calling for fire, has a Range Interavl of 36 in

equipment.name: Laser Target Designator
spcRules: A model with an LTD making the Command Action: Call for Fire may re-roll both their Command and Targeting rolls for that turn
Model may not move or make any other actions for the rest of the turn

equipment.name: Handheld Integrated Target System
spcRules: No targeting hit required for Call for Fire
Any deviation rolls apply as usual

equipment.name: Lockpicks
spcRules: Equipped model may silently breach a standard locked window or door if they pass an Agility test with a -1 modifier

equipment.name: Breaching Charge
spcRules: Each charge can only be used once
Each model on the other side of the breach point within 6in is Stunned

equipment.name: Breaching Tools
spcRules: Can be used with breaching weapon or breaching charge
If model used on of those methods, add +2 to the result of the breaching roll

equipment.name: Ballistic Shield - Short
spcRules: move only move of their Agility stat and may only fire sidearms
+2 to the equipped model's Defence when being fired upon
+1 bonus in close combat

equipment.name: Rappelling Kit
spcRules: To set up, model must pass an agility test in the movement and tactical action phase
The following move the model may be moved 3in up or 6in down
Rope stays in place for the remainder of the game
Can be used by any model

equipment.name: Climbing Kit
spcRules: May move directly up and down impassable surfaces at the speed of their Agility stat

equipment.name: Tactical Ladder
spcRules: Can be deployed against an object up to 1.5 in to allow models to cross an obstacle unhindered
May be deployed anywhere that would require an Agility test to cross; may be left in place or removed for later use
Light enough to be pulled up on roofs and elevated areas; denying enemy use

equipment.name: Tactical Diving Kit
spcRules: May move through deep water at the speed of their Agility stat
